title: Statement from the Press Secretary on the Visit of President Jimmy Morales of the Republic of Guatemala – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
July 12, 2019
President Donald J. Trump will welcome President Jimmy Morales of the Republic of Guatemala to the White House on July 15, 2019.  President Trump and President Morales will discuss ways to create a more robust relationship focused on addressing migration and security priorities.  The two leaders will also discuss how Guatemala can build a stronger relationship with its Central American partners to expand economic growth, create jobs, and promote opportunities for their citizens.
